I've worked with and alongside Jonathan for years in the indie rpg scene. He's the bright hipster type, among the best of the breed.

I know Dan from the Story Games forums. This alone is worth about 50 hours in my book - we're a tight bunch in the indie rpg scene, everybody working long-term to build up their reputation. I'll have to add more hearts as I get them, I guess.

Eero is the author of Solar System.

I have always believed that gifts  should be inherently shared. (When you see a great movie, don't you feel a desire to share?)

I want to bring to your attention a great treasure in our community of whom you might not be aware.

I am referring to David Ream, MKP brother who lives in Seaview and who is in my humble opinion the best bodyworker I have ever experienced.

Since I have been living here in Puna, I have experienced a number of bodyworkers, but David is in a class all his own. Never before have I experienced a bodyworker who has integrated so many different modalities in his own, intuitive,  methodical approach to heal my body: chiropractic, Rolfing, Thai, a combination of deep tissue, muscle and skeletal work  that leaves me feeling far more energized. My body feels like it has returned to my 30s.  

His fee is $1 a minute. I opt for 2 hr sessions and I always pay him more than his ask because of the value I receive from each session. 

As a community, I believe we are here to support each other and David's incalculable gifts, I believe, will bring you to a new level of well-being.
